name: Ngaox for Angular
description: Ngaox is a collection of Angular components and utilities designed to make your life easier. We mainly aim at providing solutions for common web needs that are still missing from Angular, such as inlining SVGs, SEO management, and more.

name: Moroccan PHPers
description: The Moroccan PHPers is a group of PHP developers and enthusiasts who aim at sharing our knowledge and encourage PHP dev in Morocco. Accelerate your career and skills by participating in our meetups, workshops, talks, challenges...

name: Ngaox Templates
description: What is better than having a great development framework with a rich collection of libraries that takes all the creepy work? You guessed it! Nice-looking, high-performance templates that can meet your current and future needs!
